Text: Would someone please unscrew the "recaptcha" verification tool? How is anybody supposed to post new torrents when the verification box doesn't show up to begin with ?

needlethread=

Check your addblocker if you have one. But I think its just down for some reason. I tried to upload 2 days ago but had the same problem. But the next day it was there again. So idk, just wait and see I guess.
